What do I do?

I work on Local Search Quality where I employ NLP and ML techniques to solve ranking and triggering problems.

Where am I from?

I've lived and traveled throughout the world.

  • Grew up in the culturally rich city of Lahore.
  • Schooled at Grinnell College in Iowa, punctuated by a semester abroad in Budapest.
  • Now I reside in the techno-utopia that is the Bay Area.
  • Scouser at heart.
